context: Hello hello I'm well and yourself?
I'm doing great! What is your favorite movie?
Oh my favorite movie is The Man in the Iron Mask (1998) What about yours?

Oh nice. I have to check it out! Anyway, nice chatting with you!
entity: The Man in the Iron Mask (1998)
resp: I also really like The Count of Monte Cristo (2002) . It doesn't have music but it has a great story!
